text: [Applause]
in northern Gaza families are on the run
bet Haneen sits next to the Israeli
border they're taking as much as they
can carry and feed as fast as they can
we were sitting in our houses this woman
cries they started shelling us he went
to a relative's house then they started
shelling there
Ezreal says its forces are searching for
tunnels used by Palestinian militants
for cross-border raids there are no
tenants there is nothing in our area
here that is just what they want to tell
the other countries to justify this this
is one of the key areas of their
targeting the drones are in the sky
we've heard tank shells being fired and
artillery in the last hour and we've
seen families on the run running in
every possible direction not sure where
this military operation is going not
sure where they should go for safety
israel says it's not targeting civilians
but more are doing at the morgue they
say goodbye to 22 year old Hamid every
funeral is a moment of public mourning
and private grief Hamas is still firing
rockets into Israel and we filmed Israel
targeting buildings of Hamas leaders but
Hamas vows it won't destroy them
[Music]
loose to set BBC News Gaza
